gang,
the chicago shinsa show is coming up hot and heavy next week.

As the " local yokel " ( as one listero fondly called me ) , I 
strongely suggest you do not fly in to Midway airport .
O'hare Airport is where the hotel shuttle bus runs.


South side of Chicago is considered " edgy ".

milt
